location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国陕西省富平县陶艺村
location.en: Taoyi Village, Fuping County, Shaanxi Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党政治人物习仲勋的墓地，同时也是一个爱国主义教育基地。
description.en: The tomb of Xi Zhongxun, a political figure of the Communist Party of China, and also a patriotic education base.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，被视为中共八大元老之一。他是现任中共中央总书记习近平的父亲。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, considered one of the Eight Great Eminent Officials of the CPC. He is the father of the current CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央宣传部、中华人民共和国教育部等机构联合命名及管理的，用以对民众，特别是青少年进行爱国主义教育的场所的总称。
description.en: A general term for places jointly named and managed by the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee, the Ministry of Education of the PRC, and other institutions, used to conduct patriotic education for the public, especially for young people.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo of the Communist Party of China and its Standing Committee.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副职负责人。
description.en: The deputy head of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院秘书长

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院秘书长
en: Secretary-General of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员之一，负责处理国务院的日常工作。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for handling the daily work of the State Council.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长
全国人大常委会副委员长
en: Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关常设机关的副职领导人。
description.en: The deputy leader of the standing body of the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The paramount leader of the second generation of leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of China's reform and opening up.

en: Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 指在邓小平主政时期，于中华人民共和国拥有实际最高决策权的一批中国共产党元老政治家。
description.en: Refers to a group of elder statesmen of the Communist Party of China who held ultimate decision-making power in the People's Republic of China during the era of Deng Xiaoping's leadership.

description.zh-cn: 现任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是中华人民共和国的最高领导人。他是习仲勋的次子。
description.en: The current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, serving as the paramount leader of the PRC. He is the second son of Xi Zhongxun.

en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的主要负责人，是中国共产党的最高领导人。
description.en: The head of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the highest-ranking official within the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 指代中国共产党执政时期的最高领导团队。
description.en: Refers to the top leadership team during the rule of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高领导人

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人
en: Paramount leader of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治中拥有最高权力的领导人的非官方称谓。
description.en: An unofficial title for the political leader who holds the highest power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China, which he ruled as the chairman of the Communist Party of China from its establishment in 1949 until his death in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋陵园是中国的爱国主义教育基地之一。
description.en: The Xi Zhongxun Mausoleum is one of China's patriotic education bases.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋是中国共产党的一位政治人物。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun was a political figure of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局
中国共产党中央书记处
中华人民共和国国务院副总理
中华人民共和国国务院秘书长
全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋被视为邓小平主政时期的中共八大元老之一。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun was considered one of the Eight Great Eminent Officials of the CPC during Deng Xiaoping's leadership.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋是邓小平主政时期的重要政治人物和盟友，是中共八大元老之一。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun was an important political figure and ally during Deng Xiaoping's leadership, and was one of the Eight Great Eminent Officials of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 习近平是习仲勋的次子。
description.en: Xi Jinping is the second son of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 习近平自2012年起担任中共中央总书记。
description.en: Xi Jinping has served as the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee since 2012.

description.zh-cn: 习近平是中共第五代领导集体的核心。
description.en: Xi Jinping is the core of the fifth generation of CPC leadership.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高领导人

description.zh-cn: 习近平自2012年成为中国共产党第五代领导集体的最高领导人。
description.en: Xi Jinping became the paramount leader of the fifth generation of the CPC leadership collective in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平准备出任中共最高领导人时，当地政府开始大规模扩建习仲勋陵园。
description.en: When Xi Jinping was preparing to become the paramount leader of the CPC, the local government began a large-scale expansion of the Xi Zhongxun Mausoleum.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋陵园内有一座石碑，上刻毛泽东的话：『党的利益在第一位』。
description.en: There is a stone stele in the Xi Zhongxun Mausoleum inscribed with Mao Zedong's words: 'The interests of the Party come first'.
